com.googlecode.sarasvati.impl
Class TokenSetOrJoinStrategy

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.sarasvati.join.TokenSetJoinStrategy
      com.googlecode.sarasvati.impl.TokenSetOrJoinStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
JoinStrategy
public class TokenSetOrJoinStrategy
extends TokenSetJoinStrategy

Implements a join strategy in which nodes will wait for for all active arc tokens in a given token set to arrive at that node, and for there to be no active node tokens in the token set.

A specific token set may be specified by name using the joinParam. If none is specified, the first incomplete token set that the token is a member of will be selected. If the incoming arc token does not belong to a token set, it falls back to using OrJoinStrategy.

Author:
Paul Lorenz

performFallbackJoin

public JoinResult performFallbackJoin(Engine engine,

Called if the node token is not a member of a suitable token set. Falls back to OrJoinStrategy.
